sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useParams, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/ProductDetail.css'; import airfryer from '../assets/images/airfryer.jpg'; import cottonscarf from '../assets/images/cottonscarf.jpg'; import jacket from '../assets/images/jacket.jpg'; import leatherwallet from '../assets/images/leatherwallet.jpg'; import mixergrinder from '../assets/images/mixergrinder.jpg'; import smartwatch from '../assets/images/smartwatch.jpg'; import sneakers from '../assets/images/sneakers.jpg'; import speaker from '../assets/images/speaker.jpg'; import sunglasses from '../assets/images/sunglasses.jpg'; import tshirt from '../assets/images/tshirt.jpg'; import wirelessheadphones from '../assets/images/wirelessheadphones.jpg'; const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Wireless Headphones', price: 299, originalPrice: 399, image: wirelessheadphones, rating: 4.8, reviews: 324, description: 'Experience exceptional sound quality with our premium wireless headphones. Featuring active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio for music lovers and professionals alike.', features: [ 'Active Noise Cancellation', '30-hour battery life', 'Quick charge (5 min = 3 hours)', 'Premium leather cushions', 'Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity', 'Built-in voice assistant' ], category: 'Electronics' }, { id: 2, name: 'Smartwatch', price: 199, originalPrice: 249, image: smartwatch, rating: 4.6, reviews: 156, description: 'Track your fitness goals and stay connected with this advanced smartwatch. Monitor heart rate, sleep patterns, and receive notifications right on your wrist.', features: [ 'Heart rate monitoring', 'Sleep tracking', 'GPS built-in', 'Water resistant (50m)', '7-day battery life', 'Multiple sport modes' ], category: 'Wearables' }, { id: 3, name: 'Mixer Grinder', price: 899, originalPrice: 1099, image: mixergrinder, rating: 4.9, reviews: 89, description: 'Powerful mixer grinder with multiple jars for all your kitchen needs. Perfect for grinding spices, making chutneys, and preparing smoothies.', features: [ '750W powerful motor', '3 stainless steel jars', 'Overload protection', 'Easy to clean', '2-year warranty', 'Multiple speed settings' ], category: 'Kitchen Appliances' }, { id: 4, name: 'Bluetooth Speaker', price: 129, originalPrice: 159, image: speaker, rating: 4.5, reviews: 267, description: 'Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful bass and crystal-clear highs. Perfect for outdoor adventures or home entertainment.', features: [ '360-degree sound', 'Waterproof (IPX7)', '20-hour battery', 'USB-C fast charging', 'Voice assistant ready', 'Party mode pairing' ], category: 'Audio' }, { id: 5, name: 'Leather Wallet', price: 179, originalPrice: 219, image: leatherwallet, rating: 4.7, reviews: 142, description: 'Premium genuine leather wallet with RFID blocking technology. Stylish and secure storage for your cards and cash.', features: [ 'Genuine leather construction', 'RFID blocking technology', '8 card slots', 'Bill compartment', 'Coin pocket', 'Slim profile design' ], category: 'Accessories' }, { id: 6, name: 'Sneakers', price: 149, originalPrice: 199, image: sneakers, rating: 4.6, reviews: 198, description: 'Comfortable and stylish sneakers perfect for daily wear. Made with breathable materials and cushioned sole for all-day comfort.', features: [ 'Breathable mesh upper', 'Cushioned midsole', 'Durable rubber outsole', 'Lightweight design', 'Available in multiple colors', 'Easy to clean' ], category: 'Footwear' }, { id: 7, name: 'Jacket', price: 1099, originalPrice: 1299, image: jacket, rating: 4.5, reviews: 112, description: 'Stylish and warm jacket perfect for winter weather. Water-resistant material with insulated lining for maximum comfort.', features: [ 'Water-resistant fabric', 'Insulated lining', 'Multiple pockets', 'Adjustable hood', 'YKK zippers', 'Machine washable' ], category: 'Clothing' }, { id: 8, name: 'T-Shirt', price: 499, originalPrice: 599, image: tshirt, rating: 4.3, reviews: 204, description: 'Premium cotton t-shirt with comfortable fit and modern design. Perfect for casual wear and everyday comfort.', features: [ '100% premium cotton', 'Pre-shrunk fabric', 'Comfortable fit', 'Fade-resistant colors', 'Machine washable', 'Available in multiple sizes' ], category: 'Clothing' }, { id: 9, name: 'Cotton Scarf', price: 349, originalPrice: 399, image: cottonscarf, rating: 4.2, reviews: 88, description: 'Soft and lightweight cotton scarf perfect for any season. Versatile accessory that complements any outfit.', features: [ '100% organic cotton', 'Lightweight and breathable', 'Versatile styling options', 'Hypoallergenic', 'Easy care instructions', 'Multiple color options' ], category: 'Accessories' }, { id: 10, name: 'Sunglasses', price: 599, originalPrice: 699, image: sunglasses, rating: 4.6, reviews: 173, description: 'Stylish sunglasses with UV protection and polarized lenses. Perfect for outdoor activities and fashion statement.', features: [ 'UV400 protection', 'Polarized lenses', 'Lightweight frame', 'Scratch-resistant coating', 'Comfortable nose pads', 'Includes carrying case' ], category: 'Accessories' }, { id: 11, name: 'Air Fryer', price: 1599, originalPrice: 1899, image: airfryer, rating: 4.8, reviews: 226, description: 'Healthy cooking made easy with this advanced air fryer. Cook your favorite foods with little to no oil for healthier meals.', features: [ '5.5L large capacity', 'Digital touch controls', '8 preset cooking modes', 'Non-stick basket', 'Dishwasher safe parts', 'Auto shut-off feature' ], category: 'Kitchen Appliances' } ]; const ProductDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const product = products.find(p => p.id === parseInt(id)); if (!product) { return (

Product not found

Return to Home
); } const handleOrderNow = () => { navigate('/order-success'); }; const discount = Math.round(((product.originalPrice - product.price) / product.originalPrice) * 100); return (
{/* Header */}
{/* Product Image */}
{/* Product Info */}
{product.category}

{product.name}

⭐ {product.rating}
({product.reviews} reviews) In Stock
₹{product.price} ₹{product.originalPrice} {discount}% OFF

Description

{product.description}

Key Features

    {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • • {feature}
    • ))}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* Shipping Info */}
🚚 Free shipping on orders over ₹500
🛡️ 2-year warranty included
🔄 30-day return policy
); }; export default ProductDetail;
